Hello all!

We've recently gone ahead and completely reworked our setup in Las Vegas and alongside our friends over at Hostodo gone and built a new control panel to replace SolusVM. We want to be able to offer our clients features that SolusVM has restricted us from being able to offer, use of SSH keys was a key feature missing and we have many more including BGP, backups and snapshots coming in the near future. 

The new panel is called Dahlia. Dahlias are a beautiful flower and is also the national flower of Mexico.

BGP support is currently in closed beta. Please open a support ticket if you'd like to take part!

##DirectAdmin is also available with all plans! Please open a ticket with sales!
